name: Night Hope Demo
description:
welcome to the night of hope  Have you ever had a nightmare?  Are you afraid of having nightmares?  Because this is the nightmare of the character waking up in the dream.  But the body was still asleep.  No matter how much I tried to open my eyes, I could not wake up from the nightmare.  You can solve puzzles and escape only in your dreams.  This is what players have to do in the game is to escape from this nightmare.  We wish you a successful escape from this nightmare. Good luck!

How to play : การสังเกตมีผลต่อการดำเนิดเรื่อง
